text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump Yes Pelosi is going to investigate trump for what he did not do to fight the coronavirus for 2 months.If your incompetent ass did your job you would be working with her and not against her.Republicans seem to not care about the death of their constituents that includes you.
